src/serial/zsc-src/memalloc.f File Reference

Detailed Description

If FLAG is 1 then memory is allocated for the following common arrays:

  • p (pressure)
  • u (velocity)
  • phi (order parameter)
  • ni (near neighbors)
  • f (order parameter distribution function)
  • g (momentum distribution function)

These are the arrays required by the D2Q5/D2Q9 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM, and are deallocated when FLAG is different from one.
